sect2.title: Installation de E2fsprogs
sect2.para: Installez E2fsprogs en lançant les commandes suivantes :

screen.userinput: mkdir ../e2fsprogs-build && cd ../e2fsprogs-build && ../e2fsprogs-&e2fsprogs-version;/configure --prefix=/usr --with-root-prefix="" \ --enable-elf-shlibs && make && make install && make install-libs && install-info /usr/share/info/libext2fs.info /usr/share/info/dir
